properties.name: security.public-paths
properties.description: Public paths (no token required) that bypass the Firebase filter.

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS.

properties.name: cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed HTTP methods for CORS.

properties.name: cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed headers for CORS. Use '*' for any.

properties.name: cors.exposed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of exposed headers for CORS.
